title: Visual Commonsense Knowledge

definitions.VisualCOMET: Cognitive Image Understanding via Visual Commonsense Graphs

summary: The slide presents the concept of VisualCOMET, which stands for Cognitive Image Understanding via Visual Commonsense Graphs. It includes an image with a caption describing an event where a person is holding onto a statue in a sinking ship. The slide also features a flowchart with three columns detailing the actions and thoughts of the person before, during, and after the event, as well as the likely outcomes.
